data.text: I spent beautiful day in H hotel during iftar time very nice service an w drink coffee in the gallery it was very nice thanks ahmed you are really nice we will make it one more time and we ordered some pastrys it was very nice iam extremely happy with over all the day

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear GrandTour31415317030

We're delighted to hear that you had a beautiful experience at The H Hotel during Iftar! It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed the service and had a pleasant time drinking coffee in the gallery. Ahmed and the team are thrilled to have contributed to your positive experience. Thank you for choosing to spend your time with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable visit.

Best Regards

Adnan Zafar
Quality & Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Adnan Zafar

data.text: The H hotel is a great hotel with excellent service. Good Gym, good restaurants and nice breakfast. The person cleaning the room Mr. Jahadul H. K. Did a great job keeping my room in perfect condition. The check in procedure went smoothly. I actually got my room 3 hours before the official check in. Well done Hotel H
data.title: Perfect stay at the H hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear nielsj867

Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay at The H Hotel and that our services, including the gym, restaurants, and breakfast, met your expectations. We're especially glad to hear that Mr. Jahadul H. K. provided excellent service in keeping your room in perfect condition. Your compliments will be passed along to him and the team. We strive to provide smooth check-in experiences and are pleased to hear that you were able to access your room early. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to The H Hotel in the future!

Best Regards

Adnan Zafar
Quality & Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Adnan Zafar

data.text:
Mr. Jahadul Isam is excellent in doing his duty maintaing the cleanliness of the Room.
His abilities to clean the Room is very good and is very much appdeciated
He is very cordial and friendly person and is an excellent Asset to the Hotel.
Wish him all the Best.!!
data.title: House keeping is well maintained and excellent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Explore06915693117

We're delighted to hear such high praise for Mr. Jahadul Isam! Thank you for recognizing his dedication to maintaining the cleanliness of our rooms. We appreciate your kind words about his abilities and his friendly demeanor. He is indeed a valuable asset to our hotel, and we will be sure to pass on your commendations to him. Wishing Mr. Jahadul Isam continued success, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent stay at our hotel!

Best Regards

Adnan Zafar
Quality & Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Adnan Zafar

data.text: This property is really nice I find one of the best hospitality in dubai special mention to housekeeping staff they are taking care of my room. Bath room was very clean and tidy. Thanks for your amazing service. I will definitely come back to the h hotel.
data.title: Nice property

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Getaway09488670169

We're thrilled to hear that you found our property to your liking and that you experienced one of the best hospitality experiences in Dubai! Your kind words about our housekeeping staff and their meticulous care of your room are greatly appreciated. Thank you for acknowledging their efforts. We're glad you enjoyed the cleanliness and tidiness of your bathroom. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back to The H Hotel for another memorable stay. Thank you for choosing us, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Best Regards

Adnan Zafar
Quality & Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.author: Adnan Zafar

data.text: Such a great time in this hotel!! Gym facilities was superb!! The rooms was bit old bus still they maintained with regards with the cleanliness. The housekeepers are so professional and they always clean our room on time. I would like to express my satisfaction of the service in this hotel.
data.title: Friends staycation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Juliusr890

We're delighted to hear that you had a great time during your stay at our hotel! It's wonderful to know that you enjoyed our superb gym facilities and appreciated the cleanliness maintained by our dedicated housekeeping team. Your satisfaction with our service is truly appreciated. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent experience!

Best Regards

Adnan Zafar
